Errors.404_DESC: Oops... this page seems to have been lost in the universe - I think the intern had a bit too much free time! Maybe you mistyped the URL or it was deleted? I'm sad about it. üòî

Footer.copyright: üíñ made with love and attention to detail
Footer.description: Bl4cklist is a German gaming and tech Discord server that provides a friendly community for gamers and tech enthusiasts. Join our growing community and enjoy exciting discussions, events, and shared gaming sessions.

Dropdown.serverTeamDesc: Get to know our awesome team!
Dropdown.ourHistoryDesc: This is how it all started for us..
Dropdown.techFeaturesDesc: Learn what we do to help you!
Dropdown.faqDesc: We have an answer for everything!
Dropdown.formerTeamMembersDesc: Without them there would have been chaos for a long time..
Dropdown.globalChatDesc: Chat with users from other servers!

WelcomeHero.description: Our German Discord server for technology and gaming is the perfect community for everyone interested in programming, coding help, and current gaming trends. üöÄ

IntroSection.title: THIS IS US.
IntroSection.description: Bl4cklist is a general coding & tech Discord server with a main focus on Discord bots and offers its own programming courses.
IntroSection.description2: But we have even more: Spend your time chatting with our loving community, make new friends or just relax and enjoy all kinds of news from the gaming world - we want to connect the most diverse Discord server communities.
IntroSection.tip_1_desc: ‚Ä∫ Ask your questions in our Discord server and get quick help from our community ‚Äì whether it's a bug or a general coding problem.
IntroSection.tip_2_desc: ‚Ä∫ In our counseling you can (also anonymously) talk about personal problems ‚Äì our community listens and gives you supportive advice.
IntroSection.tip_3_desc: ‚Ä∫ Our lovingly own developed Discord bots support you on managing your Discord server and are available in several languages.
IntroSection.tip_4_desc: ‚Ä∫ We host plenty of new events & giveaways every week where you can win all kinds of different prizes.
IntroSection.tip_5_desc: ‚Ä∫ With us you will find 500+ Discord server templates for the perfect start & you can also advertise your Discord server.
IntroSection.tip_6_desc: ‚Ä∫ Our Discord bot publishes the latest articles from the gaming & tech world around the clock with the help of GameStar to keep you entertained.

ClankGiveawaysSection.infoTag: START COMPLEX DISCORD GIVEAWAYS IN SECONDS!
ClankGiveawaysSection.title: Start Giveaways
ClankGiveawaysSection.description: With our Discord giveaway bot you can take your giveaways to a new level - start giveaways in a matter of seconds completely to your liking! You can also set participation conditions, change the design and much more!
ClankGiveawaysSection.description2: However, our bot is unique: Of course there is a lot of competition but we offer things you've never seen before: Set "Custom" conditions & design changes for giveaway messages are just the beginning! Invite our bot and try it out now.
ClankGiveawaysSection.tip_1_desc: ‚Ä∫ Thanks to powerful performance and thoughtful settings, the whole process takes less than a minute.
ClankGiveawaysSection.tip_2_desc: ‚Ä∫ You can prepare giveaways comfortably and have the bot automatically start them at a later time.
ClankGiveawaysSection.tip_3_desc: ‚Ä∫ Whether you want to change the embed thumbnail, the embed color, or the giveaway participation emoji: customize it for yourself!
ClankGiveawaysSection.tip_4_desc: ‚Ä∫ Our bot counts all messages, server invites & voice channel activity of users and analyzes them for you.
ClankGiveawaysSection.tip_5_desc: ‚Ä∫ Block roles, set bonus channels, or award achievements - there are 10+ different categories for special effects!
ClankGiveawaysSection.tip_6_desc: ‚Ä∫ In addition to 10+ prebuilt functional conditions, you also have the option to create completely custom ones!

ClankSupportSection.title: Support Tickets
ClankSupportSection.description: With our Discord Support Bot, handling questions, user reports & issues from your community becomes fun! Thanks to the revolutionary system for managing support requests, it's easy to keep an overview.
ClankSupportSection.description2: Our support system works with forum channels and is organized using tags, so every team member always maintains an overview. A user only needs to send a private message to the bot and a ticket is created automatically.
ClankSupportSection.tip_1_desc: ‚Ä∫ The team receives many useful automated notes in tickets when an action was taken ‚Äî for example a server boost or similar.
ClankSupportSection.tip_2_desc: ‚Ä∫ Create support tickets that are automatically answered by the support bot using a custom response.
ClankSupportSection.tip_3_desc: ‚Ä∫ Click a simple button inside a ticket to manage and close it within seconds.
ClankSupportSection.tip_4_desc: ‚Ä∫ After each closed ticket, the ticket creator can rate the support with a button click & the team can view the feedback.
ClankSupportSection.tip_5_desc: ‚Ä∫ Our bot will immediately inform the ticket creator in newly created support tickets if the server team is currently offline.
ClankSupportSection.tip_6_desc: ‚Ä∫ You can additionally set up a separate voice channel support that works the same way as in TeamSpeak3.

ClankSecuritySection.infoTag: DEFEND YOUR SERVER EFFECTIVELY & STAY IN CONTROL!
ClankSecuritySection.title: Protect your server
ClankSecuritySection.description: With our Discord Security Bot you greatly improve moderation on your Discord server and at the same time reduce the workload for important tasks ‚Äî our bot's job is to make your server team's life easier.
ClankSecuritySection.description2: Whether tools for raid protection or simple but powerful auto-moderation rules: it has a lot to offer and will make life difficult for rule-breakers trying to bypass your rules. It offers intelligent tools that help any community.
ClankSecuritySection.tip_1_desc: ‚Ä∫ Ban users who joined within a certain timeframe, automatically detect fake & raid accounts, and much more!
ClankSecuritySection.tip_2_desc: ‚Ä∫ Users can immediately request re-access via a private message to the bot after being unbanned.
ClankSecuritySection.tip_3_desc: ‚Ä∫ By using a dynamic forum channel you retain full control over all events on your server.
ClankSecuritySection.tip_4_desc: ‚Ä∫ With a few clicks you activate our effective, prebuilt auto-moderation setup and protect your server.
ClankSecuritySection.tip_5_desc: ‚Ä∫ Assign special server roles that can access prebuilt moderation actions without granting admin rights.
ClankSecuritySection.tip_6_desc: ‚Ä∫ Our bot creates daily backups of your Discord server & quarantines dangerous users on your server.

ClankGlobalSection.infoTag: CHAT GLOBALLY WITH DISCORD USERS FROM OTHER SERVERS!
ClankGlobalSection.title: The Global Chat
ClankGlobalSection.description: With our Discord Global-Chat Bot, Discord server chats become unnecessary: chat globally with users from many different communities! You don't need to be a member of server X to chat with users from server Y.
ClankGlobalSection.description2: The bot shares messages from a specific channel that a server admin can designate with many others, so users don't necessarily have to be on your server to participate in the chat.
ClankGlobalSection.tip_1_desc: ‚Ä∫ We are the most active global server chat in all of Germany, so you'll always find someone to chat with.
ClankGlobalSection.tip_2_desc: ‚Ä∫ Messages sent in the global chat are forwarded to all external global chats within seconds.
ClankGlobalSection.tip_3_desc: ‚Ä∫ We have an in-house moderation team that monitors the chat around the clock and intervenes in emergencies.
ClankGlobalSection.tip_4_desc: ‚Ä∫ Level up through chat activity to earn new rank colors, rewards, and other benefits - you can even win premium for the bot!
ClankGlobalSection.tip_5_desc: ‚Ä∫ Advertising is allowed - showcase your Discord server here, be active, and reach many new users from other servers.
ClankGlobalSection.tip_6_desc: ‚Ä∫ Customize the global chat's appearance slightly, like the avatar or set a server description for yourself.

TeamSection.infoTag: WHO TAKES CARE OF OUR DISCORD COMMUNITY?
TeamSection.title: THE SERVER TEAM
TeamSection.description: ‚Ä∫ Our dedicated server team ensures safety, support, and exciting community events on our Discord server, so all members can feel comfortable and have fun together.
TeamSection.rank_owner_desc: The management takes care of the entire server administration, organization, and the implementation of new ideas.
TeamSection.rank_admin_desc: The admins mostly support the management or sometimes already help with processing applications.
TeamSection.rank_senior_desc: The senior mods are experienced moderators and take care of the support team. They act as a kind of "mentor."
TeamSection.rank_mod_desc: The mods are important parts of the team. They handle tickets, moderation, and administer smaller elements.
TeamSection.rank_dev_desc: The developers take care of the development of our systems and assist the management with technical implementation.
TeamSection.rank_helper_desc: The helpers are new to our team. They handle support tickets, moderate the chat, and are getting used to their tasks.

HistorySection.infoTag: HOW DID WE ACTUALLY COME ABOUT?
HistorySection.title: THE HISTORY..
HistorySection.description: üìú ‚Ä∫ Together with our Discord community, we've experienced a lot. We've made many wonderful new memories and found lots of new friends. Bl4cklist was a place to forget the stress of everyday life for a while.
HistorySection.description2: ‚ö° ‚Ä∫ But this was just the beginning: Even after many revolutionary and unique ideas, we're still going strong: We'll always be here for you & we still have plenty of tricks up our sleeve to keep you entertained and inspired.
HistorySection.description3: üíñ ‚Ä∫ We are grateful to every single user who has visited, chatted, donated, or supported us within our team over the past time. Without you, Bl4cklist wouldn't be what it is today and we won't forget a single one of you!
HistorySection.description4: ü§î ‚Ä∫ To give you a little insight into what we've experienced together, we've compiled some special moments here.
HistorySection.ITEM_1_DESC: ‚Ä∫ So that server admins no longer have to set up the Discord bot awkwardly via countless slash commands, we have implemented a beautiful dashboard for it.
HistorySection.ITEM_2_TITLE: üî• ~ All bots in one: Clank goes public!
HistorySection.ITEM_2_DESC: ‚Ä∫ It took us a lot of time to work on the individual Discord bots, so we bundled them all into one: Clank happily sees the light of day!
HistorySection.ITEM_3_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Earn karma to unlock new server benefits by solving programming questions from other users - the channel system is inspired by StackOverflow.
HistorySection.ITEM_4_TITLE: ü§ñ ~ Rebrand: Tech is our thing now!
HistorySection.ITEM_4_DESC: ‚Ä∫ As our own websites, Discord bots & server management became more of a topic and interest grew, we switched to a new, more fitting server theme.
HistorySection.ITEM_5_DESC: ‚Ä∫ This was meant to help server admins build and launch a good Discord server - with useful tutorials & many server templates from the community!
HistorySection.ITEM_6_DESC: ‚Ä∫ With our own support bot, tickets should be organized & easy to process with lots of useful information (like team availability info or FAQ topics)
HistorySection.ITEM_7_DESC: ‚Ä∫ We thought about it for a long time and you wished for it - we set up a counseling channel where you can (even anonymously) talk about your problems.
HistorySection.ITEM_8_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Our Discord server has now existed for about 2 years and it's time for a real identity: We have set a new server theme (community server in the "Wild West") & logo.
HistorySection.ITEM_9_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Probably our most popular Discord bot was finally released after over 6 months and has been continuously improved over the years with the help of our community - with an eye for detail!
HistorySection.ITEM_10_DESC: ‚Ä∫ During this time, Discord had enormous problems with massive bot accounts - we developed an automatic & strong protection so you can protect your communities.
HistorySection.ITEM_11_TITLE: üåç ~ The first Discord bot: Global Chat
HistorySection.ITEM_11_DESC: ‚Ä∫ This bot enables server-wide communication with other users, even if they are not on your server - this is practical for smaller servers for more active chats & some advertising.
HistorySection.ITEM_12_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Our first own website was meant to present our Discord server, highlight our server partners and reach new users, in search of our own identity..
HistorySection.ITEM_13_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Discord was something completely new for everyone: it was exciting! Started as a small GTA5 crew, we evolved into a general community server.

CodingHero.title: TECH & CODING
CodingHero.description: Our Discord server focuses heavily on software development & technology. We offer small learning courses, public Discord bots, a coding support channel, and automated tech news from GameStar.
CodingHero.description2: Our coding support system is inspired by StackOverflow and each helpful answer is rewarded! Take a look and maybe we can solve your unanswered problem.

CodingFeatures.infoTag: HOW CAN WE HELP YOU LEARN PROGRAMMING?
CodingFeatures.title: WHAT WE OFFER YOU!
CodingFeatures.description: ‚Ä∫ The world of hardware & software is mysterious and complex: We've also had a tough journey to climb this path! However, we offer several major features that can help you implement your own project in no time or get an exciting first insight.
CodingFeatures.BENTO_1_DESC: Always stay informed about the latest topics from the gaming & tech world!
CodingFeatures.BENTO_2_DESC: In our coding support, you can help other users with their code errors or questions & also get help yourself.
CodingFeatures.BENTO_3_DESC: Our small learning courses help you better understand programming.
CodingFeatures.BENTO_4_DESC: We have developed our own Discord bots with great attention to detail, which can inspire you or improve your server.
CodingFeatures.BENTO_5_DESC: Our huge collection of uniquely created Discord server templates helps you build & organize your new super cool project.

CodingFAQ.title: Your Questions..
CodingFAQ.description: ‚Ä∫ Over the past years, we've collected some interesting questions about our coding system that we're happy to answer! üöÄ

feature1.title: Promote Your Project
feature1.description: Reach a huge community & increase interest in your own project!

feature2.title: Our Discord Help
feature2.description: We have a huge collection of articles that help you set up your Discord server.

feature3.title: Get Free Games
feature3.description: Save real money and be notified immediately about every new free game!

feature4.title: Learn Together With Us
feature4.description: We always talk with you about our development and let you be part of it directly.

question1.title: ‚öôÔ∏è ~ Which programming languages do you support?
question1.description:
‚Ä∫ On our Discord server you'll find all known programming languages, from Python to Assembly. Since our community is very diverse and offers many different talents, it's very likely that your problem or question can be answered quickly.

‚Ä∫ Our server team mainly works with Python for Discord bots, Java for REST APIs & Minecraft plugins, and TypeScript for web development, for example for this very website.

question2.title: üåê ~ How can I put my project online?
question2.description:
‚Ä∫ There are many offers on the internet from platforms that offer to host your project for free, but we strongly advise against this as it poses massive privacy & security concerns.

‚Ä∫ We ourselves use DeinServerHost to get extremely powerful servers for little money, on which all our services run around the clock.

question3.title: ü§ñ ~ How do I develop my own Discord bot?
question3.description:
‚Ä∫ We have uploaded a small tutorial series on YouTube, in which we go through feature-by-feature in detail together with Python3.12 and discord.py - the library for Discord's API - and integrate them into our own Discord bot.

‚Ä∫ Livestreams take place on Twitch from time to time, where we continue working on this project together with you and also answer questions on the topic (or general programming questions).

question4.title: üìå ~ Do you have projects to learn from?
question4.description:
‚Ä∫ YES - Most of our projects are Open Source and therefore the complete source code can be read. This way you can learn how we implemented certain features (like a drag & drop system) or how to write unit tests.

‚Ä∫ You can also rebuild the projects for your own ideas and create something completely new! We are always very happy about your own creativity - you can find all our projects here on Github.

question5.title: üî™ ~ When was Herobrine removed from Minecraft?
question5.description: ‚Ä∫ I haven‚Äôt seen the mystery man since our first encounter, and I haven‚Äôt noticed any changes to the world other than my own. I was able to press ‚Äòprint screen‚Äô when I first saw him.

ComHero.infoTag: OUR DISCORD SERVER COMMUNITY IS UNIQUE!
ComHero.title: WE'RE ALWAYS HERE!
ComHero.description: The Bl4cklist Discord community is at the center of every decision: We regularly conduct polls to ask for your advice on important decisions and usually follow the majority before introducing new features.

TestimonialSection.infoTag: A FEW INSIGHTS FROM THE COMMUNITY..
TestimonialSection.title: WHAT YOU SAY..
TestimonialSection.description: ‚Ä∫ Together with you, we've already experienced incredibly many stories, created friendships, inspired and laughed. Here are a few stories directly from you, our server members, telling something about our wonderful Discord server "Bl4cklist" and addressing both the past and the future.
TestimonialSection.description2: üíñ ‚Ä∫ We thank each and every one who has been part of us over the past years and hope that this eternal friendship never ends - you make us what we are!

MemberListSection.description1Birthday: Today is a very special day! There are (hopefully) a few birthdays among us! To show how important it is for us to celebrate together with the Discord community, every birthday child gets the chance to be shown on our website!
MemberListSection.description2Birthday: You can use the slash command /birthday set on our Discord server to add your own birthday and be listed here as well - right at midnight. üéä
MemberListSection.infoTagLeaders: THESE MEMBERS HAVE ACHIEVED SOMETHING UNIQUE - THANK YOU!
MemberListSection.description1Leaders: Some members of our Discord server have achieved successes that only few have managed, and we are very grateful for that - you also get to be featured on our website and we sincerely thank you for your long-term support!
MemberListSection.description2Leaders: There are various ways you can end up here: use our server tag, boost our Discord server with Nitro, or donate real money to start events for the community. ü§ó
MemberListSection.infoTagLevels: THANK YOU FOR THE CONTRIBUTION THAT YOU MAKE!
MemberListSection.description1Levels: There are also many users from our community who are incredibly active with us and feel at home. For the most active members among you, we also have a small gift in the form of a mention, and we hope to never lose you!
MemberListSection.description2Levels: You can level up on our Discord server through regular activity in the form of messages in server chats, spending time in voice channels, and participating in events. üí´
MemberListSection.infoTagStaff: A FEW LEGENDS FROM OUR OLD MEMORIES!
MemberListSection.description1Staff: Here you can see some team members from our Discord server who we remember especially well. They have supported us massively for a very long time with their time: Bl4cklist and our community are so wonderful because they gave their best for it.
MemberListSection.description2Staff: Every team member who was active in our server team for more than 30 days is listed here. We, the current server team including the community, thank you for your enormous work and for dedicating your time and love! üíñ

ClankHero.title: OUR CLANK BOT
ClankHero.description: Clank is the heart of your Discord server: In addition to easy use & beautiful menus, it offers you everything you need to protect & grow your own community.

ContactHero.infoTag: WE ARE ALWAYS HERE FOR YOU & YOUR REQUESTS!
ContactHero.title: CONTACT US
ContactHero.description: Do you have a question? No problem, we're here to help! Our team will get to work as quickly as possible and take care of your request in no time. Simply choose the appropriate form and scroll down to fill out the correct one.
ContactHero.formUnbanDescription: You were banned from our Discord server and want to be part of us again? Then fill out this form and get a chance!
ContactHero.formGeneralDescription: Use this form if you have general questions or concerns that our nice discord server-team should address. We try to answer fast.

ContactForm.descriptionEmpty: Welcome to our contact page! Here you can get in touch with our server team and explain your problems or questions in a factual way. Alternatively, you can request an unban from our Discord server, where you apologize and provide the necessary information about yourself.
ContactForm.descriptionEmpty2: We do our best to solve your problem as quickly as possible and are already looking forward to your request ‚Äì however, please note that it may take a few days until you receive a reply from us. This depends on how much is going on at the moment and whether it is a more extensive topic.
ContactForm.infoTagGeneral: DO YOU HAVE A QUESTION OR A PROBLEM?
ContactForm.descriptionGeneral: You can use this contact form to reach us for legal questions as well as general concerns about our Discord server or the website ‚Äì feel free to contact us here if there are any open questions or something that needs clarification.
ContactForm.descriptionGeneral2: We usually respond to your request within a few days, but depending on a current event or higher demand, this time may vary significantly.
ContactForm.infoTagUnban: GET ACCESS TO OUR DISCORD SERVER AGAIN!
ContactForm.descriptionUnban: With this form you can submit a request for an unban from our Discord server. Please fill out all required fields and honestly explain why you were banned and why we should unban you.
ContactForm.descriptionUnban2: We review each request individually and will get back to you within a few days. Please understand that not every request can be approved ‚Äì the reason for your ban and the team member who banned you are optional details that help us process your request faster.

GenericMenu.title: Your Achievements
GenericMenu.isaacTitle: Isaac is sad because you scared him.. üò≠
GenericMenu.isaacEnd: Thank you! Now Isaac is happy again. :)

Misc.ripBots: In memory of our old Bl4ck-Bots..
